original_title: A Course in Miracles: Embracing True Forgiveness
overview: Often, we look look to blame others and practice a form of forgiveness that secretly allows us to continue to live our lives as victims. Discover how students and teachers in the A Course in Miracles community have been challenged to embrace True Forgiveness in their own lives by applying the lessons from A Course in Miracles to remember the truth of who they really are. The A Course in Miracles Awakening Series blends insights & personal stories from Ken Wapnick, Gary Renard and others in the ACIM community with messages directly from the Course, as read by AVAIYA founder, iKE ALLEN.
title: A Course in Miracles: Embracing True Forgiveness
